name: Duergar Name Generator
description: Unearth the perfect, guttural Duergar name! Forge your identity in the depths with names as tough and resilient as the dwarves themselves. Click, and claim your dwarven destiny!
introduction: Venture into the Underdark and claim your Duergar identity! This generator crafts names that echo the strength, cunning, and shadowed history of the Duergar. Whether you're a seasoned role-player or a curious world-builder, find a name that resonates with the spirit of these subterranean dwarves.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's like striking your pickaxe against solid rock – a new name will appear!
Don't like the first result? Keep clicking! The forge of names never sleeps.
Found a name you love? Copy it and make it your own! Just try not to hoard all the cool names for yourself...
Want something truly unique? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes from different generations. Get creative!
Remember, a good Duergar name should sound like it could carve stone and intimidate goblins. Use your imagination!

faqs.question: What exactly *is* a Duergar?
faqs.answer: Duergar, also known as gray dwarves, are a subterranean race of dwarves known for their dour personalities, psionic abilities, and skill in crafting. Think dwarves, but with a serious case of the grumps and a penchant for mind games.

faqs.question: Are these names suitable for both male and female Duergar?
faqs.answer: While some names might lean towards a specific gender, most are designed to be fairly gender-neutral. Feel free to adapt them to fit your character!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! That's what they're here for! Go forth and role-play with the might of a mountain!

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: They're based on patterns and sounds inspired by existing Duergar names and dwarven lore, but the combinations are randomized. So, yes, they're *mostly* random, with a touch of dwarven magic.

faqs.question: I generated a name that sounds a bit… silly. What gives?
faqs.answer: Hey, even Duergar have a sense of humor (a dark, twisted one, perhaps). If you don't like a name, just generate another! The Underdark is vast, and so are the possibilities.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes to be added?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for ways to improve the forge! Feel free to send your suggestions our way. Maybe your contribution will become a legend in the annals of Duergar naming!
